class.name: Maze
class.summary: Represents a maze and contains methods for building and managing the maze structure.

method.name: BuildMazeLogic
method.summary: Constructs the logical structure of the maze, including rooms and connections.

method.name: PathMaker
method.summary: Recursively creates paths in the maze starting from a given position.
method.param: The starting position for path creation.

method.name: ConNearUnconRoomDir
method.summary: Finds a direction to an unconnected room.
method.returns: int[] - The coordinates of the unconnected room.

method.name: UnconRoom_DirStep
method.summary: Gets the direction steps of nearby unconnected rooms.
method.param: The current position to check for unconnected rooms.
method.returns: int[] - An array representing the direction steps.

method.name: RandNearUnconnected_DirStep
method.summary: Randomly selects a direction to an unconnected room.
method.returns: int[] - The direction to the next unconnected room.

method.name: Connecter
method.summary: Connects the current room with the next room in the specified direction.
method.param: The current position of the room.
